channel.title: Client chat text
channel.description:
I want to change my text from my client as you see in the first one [img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j349/Mariano_FlyyBucci/test.png[/img] to like that one in the bottom to look more oldish, is it possible?
I have a cache editor.
I will not rep but I will surely appreciate it :D
